definition: Meniere's disease (loss of balance after stroke)
pinyin: Mei3 ni2 er3 shi4 zong1 he2 zheng4

sentences.english: The next day, I looked up Asperger’s syndrome on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我在維基百科上查了查阿斯伯格綜合症。

sentences.english: That is the syndrome. It is self- defeating and self-sabotaging.
sentences.chinese: 這就是“新一年決策綜合症”，是自暴自棄的敗筆。

sentences.english: Where else are asperger support programs being offered?
sentences.chinese: 還有其他地方提供亞斯伯格綜合症扶持計劃嗎？

sentences.english: Professor Hao Boge this condition is known as the "gray" psychological syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 郝伯格教授把這種病症稱爲“灰色”心理綜合症。

sentences.english: In one case, RBD preceded Parkinson's disease by 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 有一例是，RBD先於帕金森綜合症50年存在。

sentences.english: Second, what few people know is that flu itself is far more likely to cause Guillain-Barré than any flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 其次，流感本身比疫苗更容易引起巴利綜合症。

sentences.english: If you did, you could be suffering from CWS — celebrity worship syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 如果你這樣做過，那麼你可能就患有“追星綜合症”。

sentences.english: I call this Italy's “Straits of Messina Phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 我把這叫做意大利的“墨西拿綜合症”。

sentences.english: This is a leading cause of sick building syn drome, and sick human beings.
sentences.chinese: 它是導致建築綜合症和生病的主要因素。
我想到了急性戒斷綜合症。

sentences.english: Most children with Down syndrome have mild-to-moderate mental retardation.
sentences.chinese: 大多數唐氏綜合症兒童有輕度到中度的弱智。

sentences.english: Published in 1990, acquired immune deficiency syndrome prevention and control regulations.
sentences.chinese: 於1990年公佈後天免疫缺乏綜合症防治條例。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical manifestations and imaging of Goodpasture' s syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肺出血腎炎綜合症的臨牀影像學表現。

sentences.english: All you know is that they have Down syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 所有你知道的就是他們患有唐氏綜合症。

definition: disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
